metadata.description: In Inteli's Computer Science program, students earn international certifications in cloud, AI, security and agile methodologies.

content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation

content_blocks.text: When we started designing theComputer Sciencecourse at Inteli, our starting point was not just "what to teach", but to validate the learning in a meaningful way throughout the academic journey.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation

content_blocks.text: Working in collaboration with a team of incredible teachers, we took on the challenge of creating a curriculum that was both rigorous, innovative and recognized outside the walls of the institution.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation

content_blocks.text: That's when a key idea emerged: linking the content of the modules with national and international certifications that could concretely reflect the skills acquired by the students at each stage of the course.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation

content_blocks.text: Certifications from the first year
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Certifications from the first year

content_blocks.text: From the first modules, students have access to theDesign Thinking Practitionercertification, and can go on to progress to levels such as Co-Creator, Coach and Team Essentials for AI, all offered byIBM.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Certifications from the first year

content_blocks.text: These courses increase students' ability to work on innovation projects, empathize with users and work as part of a team - fundamental skills for the technology professional of today and tomorrow.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Certifications from the first year

content_blocks.text: A trail in computing and data
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: A trail in computing and data

content_blocks.text: In the fifth module, as they delve into the study of data structures and algorithms, students access the content of the renowned course byRobert Sedgewick(Princeton University), one of the leading references in the field.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: A trail in computing and data

content_blocks.text: And they go further: they can also earn certifications in graph databases withNeo4j, such as Fundamentals, Cypher, Graph Data Modeling, among other tools that are increasingly present in solutions based on networks, graphs and AI.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: A trail in computing and data

content_blocks.text: In the sixth module, knowledge of discrete mathematics can be formally recognized with international certification from theUniversity of Melbourne, a way of enhancing the theoretical basis applied to solving real problems.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: A trail in computing and data

content_blocks.text: AWS certification trail: from cloud to AI
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: AWS certification trail: from cloud to AI

content_blocks.text: From the seventh module onwards, students enter the world of theAWS Academy,starting with the Cloud Foundations certification. This is the gateway to a path that unfolds in the following modules with specific training in:
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: AWS certification trail: from cloud to AI

content_blocks.text:
From the seventh module onwards, students enter the world of theAWS Academy,starting with the Cloud Foundations certification. This is the gateway to a path that unfolds in the following modules with specific training in:

- Cloud Developing
- Cloud Security Foundations
- Cloud Architecting
- Data Engineering
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: AWS certification trail: from cloud to AI

content_blocks.text: Security, cryptography and the quantum future
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Security, cryptography and the quantum future

content_blocks.text: Closing the cycle, in module 12, students have the opportunity to explore a frontier topic: cryptography resistant to quantum computing.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Security, cryptography and the quantum future

content_blocks.text: And at the end, they can obtain IBM certification inQuantum-Safe Cryptographya huge differentiator in a scenario where digital security is becoming increasingly sophisticated and challenging.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Security, cryptography and the quantum future

content_blocks.text: Methodology that prepares you for more
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Methodology that prepares you for more

content_blocks.text: Inteli's own methodological structure opens up other certification possibilities. As we base the entire journey on the Scrum framework, combined with Project-Based Learning (PBL), students experience roles such asScrum MasterandProduct Ownerthroughout the module projects.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Methodology that prepares you for more

content_blocks.text: This creates a concrete opportunity for them, if they wish, to pursue professional certifications such asCertified ScrumMaster®(CSM); andCertified Scrum Product Owner® (CSPO),both offered by the Scrum Alliance.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Methodology that prepares you for more

content_blocks.text: Although we haven't yet identified certified students on these trails, the ground is ready and this could be the next frontier to explore.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Methodology that prepares you for more

content_blocks.text: These certifications are highly valued by the market and, more importantly, they are part of the students' own learning process. They don't "study for the certification", they experience the content that the certification validates.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Methodology that prepares you for more

content_blocks.text: This movement has generated a very positive chain effect. From the moment a student achieves their first certification - such as AWS Cloud Foundations - they begin to realize that these achievements are possible, accessible and highly valued. Many voluntarily follow more advanced paths, and it's common to see students achieving additional certifications such as:
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Methodology that prepares you for more

content_blocks.text:
This movement has generated a very positive chain effect. From the moment a student achieves their first certification - such as AWS Cloud Foundations - they begin to realize that these achievements are possible, accessible and highly valued. Many voluntarily follow more advanced paths, and it's common to see students achieving additional certifications such as:

- Azure Fundamentals, by Microsoft
- Oracle AI and Cloud Infrastructure
- Associate Cloud Engineer, Google Cloud
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: Methodology that prepares you for more

content_blocks.text: More than a role
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: More than a role

content_blocks.text: Our aim with this project was not to create a "catalog of certificates", but rather to provide our students with concrete means of recognizing and communicating their competencies, in dialogue with the market, with international academia and with the very challenges they face in real projects throughout the course.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: More than a role

content_blocks.text: Each badge earned is not just a stamp: it's a stage on a path of growth. And it's gratifying to see that this idea, which was born back then in curriculum design meetings, is now materializing in living portfolios of students who are learning, building and already impacting the world with what they know.
content_blocks.section: Certifications in the curriculum: a project that connects academic training and international validation
content_blocks.subsection: More than a role
